text: Valentin Huot (1 May 1929 â€“ 21 November 2017) was a French racing cyclist. He won the French national road race title in 1957 and 1958. He was born in Creyssensac-et-Pissot, France. Huot died on 21 November 2017 in Manzac-sur- Vern, France of bronchopneumonia, aged 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Dordogne Category:Sportspeople from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:French cyclists
title: Valentin Huot
